SCREEN AUTO AUTO 1.0

  VERTICALBOX
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS RECEIVED_TIMESECONDS # COSMOS Received Time (UTC, Floating point, Unix epoch)
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS RECEIVED_TIMEFORMATTED # COSMOS Received Time (Local time zone, Formatted string)
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS RECEIVED_COUNT # COSMOS packet received count
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS TIMESECONDS # Derived floating-point time since epoch in seconds
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS TIMEFORMATTED # Derived time since epoch as formatted string
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS CCSDSVER # CCSDS packet version number (See CCSDS 133.0-B-1)
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS CCSDSTYPE # CCSDS packet type (command or telemetry)
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS CCSDSSHF # CCSDS secondary header flag
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS CCSDSAPID # CCSDS application process id
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS CCSDSSEQFLAGS # CCSDS sequence flags
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS CCSDSSEQCNT # CCSDS packet sequence count
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS CCSDSLENGTH # CCSDS packet data length
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS TIMESEC # Seconds since epoch (January 1st, 1970, midnight)
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS TIMEUS # Microseconds of second
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS PKTID # Packet id (The combination of CCSDS_APID and PACKET_ID identify the packet)
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS VALUE5 # Value setting
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS VALUE4 # Value setting
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS VALUE3 # Value setting
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS VALUE2 # Value setting
    LABELVALUE INST PARAMS VALUE1 # Value setting
  END
